title: Women’s Cricket World Cup: Australia v India – live
summary: In Visakhapatnam, two heavyweight teams are set to clash in a group stage ODI, aiming to establish dominance in the tournament. The match is generating significant excitement, with fans eager to see how both teams perform. Follow Megan Maurice for live updates and insights throughout the game.

title: WSL: Arsenal v Brighton and more – matchday live
summary: Today's Women's Super League kick-offs are underway, with live updates provided by our writers. Stay tuned for the latest scores and highlights as the action unfolds. Don't miss out on breaking football news throughout the day.

title: Israel and Gaza prepare for release of hostages and prisoners
summary: On Monday, Israeli authorities are set to release living hostages as part of a negotiated agreement. Following this release, nearly 2,000 Palestinian detainees are expected to be freed. This development marks a significant step in ongoing tensions and negotiations between the two parties.

title: Scotland v Belarus: World Cup 2026 qualifying – live
summary: Steve Clarke's team aims for a crucial qualification win against Belarus. Follow the minute-by-minute updates as the match unfolds. Join Rob Smyth for live commentary.

title: William Hill owner could shut up to 200 shops if Reeves raises gambling taxes
summary: Evoke is evaluating its plans in light of anticipated tax increases in the upcoming budget. The changes could potentially impact up to 1,500 jobs within the company. Decisions will be made to navigate the financial challenges posed by the new tax policies.
